title.fr: PB-ListComPort - Enumérateur de port COM pour invité de commande

preamble.en:
A simple tool that can list COM ports with their name, friendly name and device name easily and cleanly.
This tool is intended to replace the tedious task of having to use the mode command, and the Device Manager to find a newly plugged-in device that provides a COM port.
